certificates.comment: Certification of standard in sustainable farms
Certification of organic coffee for exports in Japan.

history.comment: Carlos Diaz build a small house in an area of 7 hectares to harvest coffee and tangerine..
With a total of 3 hectares Las Margaritas harvested its first batch of coffee.
A first batch of 20 bags of 50kg were exported to USA

history.milestone: Las Margaritas coffee obtains Rain Forest certificate
history.comment: The farm obtains the Rain Forest certification.
